mapper.select: select boardnum , id , title , to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') inputdate ,hits from mcboard where upper(title) like upper ('%' || #{title} || '%') order by boardnum desc
select count(*) from mcboard where upper(title) like upper ('%' || #{title} || '%')

select boardnum , id , title , content , to_char(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate , to_char(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate , startPlace , tripArea , male , female , to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') inputdate from mcboard where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.update: update mcboard set hits = hits + 1 where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.select: select boardnum , id , title , content , to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') inputdate , hits , originalfile , savedfile from mcboard where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.delete: delete from mcboard where id=#{id} and BOARDNUM=#{boardnum}
mapper.insert: insert into mcreply (replynum, boardnum, id, text) values (mcreply_seq.nextval, #{boardnum}, #{id}, #{text})
mapper.select: select replynum , boardnum , id , text , to_char(inputdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') inputdate from mcreply where boardnum = #{boardnum} order by replynum desc
mapper.delete: delete from mcreply where replynum = #{replynum} and id = #{id}
